name: Copz N Zombies
description:
The endangered zombies have escaped in the Intergalactic Resort of Riverwood.
Any theft of property or harassment of the zombies will be dealt with by the local authorities.

The Mission:
Gather funds to purchase fuel cells, ..
Drop off 5 fuel cells in the green beams under the satellite ships...
Purchase a Free Blue Key Card...
Gather zombie brains and cash for extra XP,
and a Zombie Eradication bonus if you
destroy them all!
Return to the Portapooper you arrived from.
Collect your XP...Go for a new High Score!

Features:
Random character generator, with 7500+ possible characters...
Random time of day and fog depth...
Random character spawns...
Multiple weapons available...
High Scores...
Xbox gamepad supported.
